website_summaries.verdict: We love this heavy-duty grill for its beauty and durability.
pros: Made for installation in an outdoor kitchen or BBQ area
Heavy-duty construction with good weight on the lid
Drip tray under all burners makes it easy to clean
Also comes in a propane option
Includes a night light for evening grilling
cons: Grill can only be shipped within the U.S

customer_reviews.title: great grill
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill. Real stainless, tested with magnet. Looks nice and included a lot of nice accessories. Just installed in new outdoor kitchen and looks great. Tried it for first time and does nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Hitman

customer_reviews.title: Better than Weber or Fire Magic
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I've owned. I've had Webers and even a pricey Fire Magic, but Lion Grills beats them both. Even burners, thick gauge metal. No gimmicks, just a solid grill with strong and even heat. The 32" grill was plenty big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Smartbox7

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance but beware,  it's heavy
customer_reviews.text: This grill is simply amazing. I researched many options and after reading other's reviews I chose the Lion. I'm sure glad I did. The price is better than the other options and the grill is flawless. It comes with a nice assortment of accessories and it is very well made. It is very heavy so invite friends over to help install it. In no way do I regret buying the Lion grill and I am confident you'll be glad if you select one too.
customer_reviews.author: Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and installed in my new outdoor kitchen two years ago. It has made several satisfying meals since. Really well made, sturdy unit. My only complaint is that the lights inside are difficult to replace, but fortunately that's isn't something that happens very often. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great grill,  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid grill. Rotisserie works great. I saved more than 2k building this grill myself and am very happy with everything. A note that others were complaining about was the knobs getting hot. Well there are vents right above the knobs that let the grill breathe and thus heat gets to the area of the knobs and if the air does not circulate then you may get some hot knobs. It is not an electronic issue just air circulating issue.
customer_reviews.author: abcwo

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: My last grill would struggle to get to 450 degrees, this one shoots over 600 in no time, love the lights and all he extras that came with the package. I've been hyper aware of the hot knobs but haven't experienced that. Very happy with this purchase and look forward to many years of grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Desert_Dad

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy-duty construction
customer_reviews.text: We've had this grill now for a year and wow, I'm really impressed. Super heavy-duty construction, cooks evenly across the surface, easy to use and comes with some great accessories. I would recommend this grill to anyone/everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Sierawski

customer_reviews.title: Quality grill and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous grill. Quality construction throughout. All the little extras just throw it over the top. Just get it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: So far we love it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality in materials and workmanship on this BBQ is impeccable. The assembly instructions are a bit vague, but a call to customer service was all it took to clear them up. So far we love it !
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Beethe

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality grill
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality grill, used all summer so far so good. Drip tray covers all burner areas, makes cleaning easier.
customer_reviews.author: ProfEng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service !!
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with lights called Lion and they overnighted me a new transformer no charge. Working great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Movie Guy

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing on grill
customer_reviews.text: Grill is nice except there were two heat shield parts missing. Sent messages to Lion to ask for them to send replacements for the missing parts. To date, no replies have been received. This is not a cheap grill. It would be nice to have all of the parts in place before using it. That didn't happen. If I hadn't alreasy built the brick enclosure to fit it exactly I would return the unit and purchase one from a local company I could look eye to eye if parts or service is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Came with cover, hot plate/griddle, etc. Very solid. Instructions were so-so.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Nice grile. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice grile. Easy to install. Rear Rotisarrie burner never has worked. happy with the quality and weight of the lid otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago-Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for size and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: Best grill we have ever purchased. Large cooking surface and all the extras are great. Very sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Scoumperdis

customer_reviews.title: This may be one of the most amazing grills o have ever owned - rotisserie is awesome ...
customer_reviews.text: This may be one of the most amazing grills o have ever owned - rotisserie is awesome and the two lights make cooking at night fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed. This is a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: After doing considerable research on line, I selected the Lion grill. I was not disappointed. This is a high quality product. I was very pleased with the construction of the grill and its grilling capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Last grill I will ever buy, that good...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say, unbelievable buy. Solid everything and works to perfection. Super heavy duty. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality workmanship and overall thickness/weight/solid feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Douglas Wine

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best has grill I've ever owned. Cooks meat very evenly. The inside light is an awesome feature as well for those evening BBQ's.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl G.

customer_reviews.title: This is THE grill to buy for this summer!
customer_reviews.text: Lot of grill for the money. Well built, feature laden and easy to install. Compared this to Summerset & Lynx. The grates could be a bit more substantial, but that is nit picking. When the day come they need to be replaced - if ever - I can always get a heavier duty one from Lynx. Love the interior lighting and the subtle lighting on the dials. Bonus to get a custom cover for the grill and rotisserie. And the hood is top notch insulated steel. Great grill at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.author: Green Girl

customer_reviews.title: This grill is an awesome addition to our backyard experience
customer_reviews.text: This grill is an awesome addition to our backyard experience. It is easy to assemble and use. It came with a wonderful cover that fits like a glove! We love this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill. Great quality. Our installer likened it to a more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, very professional appearance. I have only used for grilling...hope to use rotisserie soon. Shipped as described
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This grill will go to 700 degrees! Have used it for 6 months without any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill - very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill - very high quality. I did a lot of shopping around before purchasing, as I had a home built with an outdoor kitchen and wanted a grill that was top of the line. This one fits the bill. Heats up fast, cleans up pretty well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari C

customer_reviews.title: A grill to last a life time.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is built like a tank and weighs about 170 pounds to prove it. Everything about it is professional gauge and looks as though it will last for many years. The cast stainless burners have a life time warranty and it comes with a rotisserie, a griddle, a smoker box, and in-built lights which are great for night time grilling. It heats up quickly and has a large, easy to read temperature gauge which is accurate enough to correctly indicate the outside temperature where I live in Florida, in the 70's and 80's. The instruction book is well written, and gives the necessary dimensions for the built in cut outs.
customer_reviews.author: Philip R Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great grill but accessories need help.
customer_reviews.text: The grill is great but the cover that came with it has already faded in the weather (3.5 months old) and the rotisserie is rusted. Shouldn't rust because it's supposedly stainless steel. Lastly, flare up is a problem. Have to clean the pieces of steel covering the burners often or your food will burn up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heavy Construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed heavy duty outdoor grill. Some of the features that I am enjoying are the easy to remove stainless steel cooking grates, the flat cooking griddle – great for vegetables, the interior LED lights, and the heavy duty rotisserie. The double insulated hood also works great for holding in the heat. I recommend the 32 inch grill. It is a large enough for the average family.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Solid BBQ grill
customer_reviews.text: Just finished our backyard and installed this grill in our outdoor bar/grill area. I find that the grill is well designed and built solidly. Seems to have plenty of grilling area for our needs. Easily lit the burners and has nice temperature control. Looking forward to trying out the rotisserie that came with the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The perfect backyard grill.
customer_reviews.text: After looking at local BBQ dealers for a grill and not wanting to spend $4,000 on a grill, I took a chance on the Lion Grill. I was a bit nervous thinking of the old adage, "You get what you pay for.", and thinking this would not live up to my needs. I was totally wrong! Lion seems to have figured out how to create a high quality grill at an affordable price. We grill at least twice a week and have not been disappointed once.
customer_reviews.author: NoOneAthome

customer_reviews.title: Super nice!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new outdoor built-in Lion BBQ grill! There was a minor problem with the regulator at first, but we contacted Lion directly and they sent a replacement part within a few days. That solved the problem. The only thing we would have wished for is that he rotisserie rod had a screw-on wooden handle like our old one did. Would make for easier handling. The lights in the unit are great. We definitely splurged on this outdoor set-up which was built into an existing chimney, but we're going to love our outdoor summer cooking in beautiful San Diego ... and never having to worry about running out of propane.
customer_reviews.author: ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Top notch. Night and day compared to old 'big box' store grill. Well made. Cooks perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: OkieDoc

customer_reviews.title: Built-in BBQ DIY
customer_reviews.text: I designed and built a grill station around this unit. There were so many good reviews, so I bought the natural gas version. Completed my install over 2 weekends. The instructions are not very well written so I will outline what you need to know. The "cutout" dimension of 31" is ok. There is a flange at the top of the cutout area that is designed to overhang the countertop by about 5/8". I designed mine with this in mind. Take advantage of this feature and you will appreciate the good engineering that went into the design!
customer_reviews.author: DIY Man

customer_reviews.title: Love Lion products!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is awesome! Extremely heavy and well-made. Our outdoor kitchen fabricator was extremely impressed, as he was not very familiar with the brand. We've had it several weeks and have grilled on it many nights already. We also bought the frig, a side burner, and a number of storage cabinets. Amazon prices can't be beat. Looking forward to lots of use for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice grill
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grill. Happy with this purchase. I also bought the Lion cabinet doors when I had my outdoor kitchen built. It all looks great and very high quality. I've cooked on it for several months, and it has performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy-duty, full featured grill. I've only used it for two days, but have been extremely impressed with the quality of every single component. After installing in a grill-island and tapping into the gas line, this grill comes with all accessories needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bender

customer_reviews.title: great grii/bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill. Works and looks great. I had to send two grills back due to arriving damaged. Amazon swapped it at twice to get me one that I would accept. Returns set the project backs weeks, but glad I stayed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Liegl

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill maintains set temperatures and plenty of room for cooking for lots of people or a few. This grill was easy to set in place and I like the night lights for evening grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Thad W.

customer_reviews.title: granite on the grill is cracking
customer_reviews.text: We like this grill and would love to use more often but the structure in which this grill is it always cracks. How can we fix the problem of granite cracking behind the grill? we got another guy to fix and after using the grill 2 times it is already cracking. appreciate the help. we want to use this grill often but the crack is making us feel we should have bought a stationary grill then a built in one. See the attached pic for reference.
customer_reviews.author: V kumar

customer_reviews.title: We ordered this BBQ and matching cabinet drawers, we ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this BBQ and matching cabinet drawers, we had to order THREE sets of cabinets each one was deleted or scratched. We finally had our backyard landscaping finished and opened the box to the BBQ and it is all dented. Will never order this brand again, all items have been badly dented or scratched.
customer_reviews.author: BigLaw Assoc.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations!  Beautiful and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived quickly and when we opened the box, we were thrilled with the appearance! It is heavy, looks substantial and best of all, grills perfectly. We have received many compliments, even from the stone installer who sees many drop in grills. He said this was the nicest he has ever seen. We agree!
customer_reviews.author: R. Leidenfrost

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the grill grates could be a little high from the burners.
customer_reviews.author: willie james

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality for a great price. Highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Boy

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill
customer_reviews.text: I love our new Lion grill. We have only used it a few times thus far. I only have one complaint at this time. That is: there is one or two areas that cook considerably hotter than the rest of the surface. And unfortunately that is in the back corner and that is the area I like to use to flash sear my steaks. Other than that issue, this is a very nice high quality grill.
customer_reviews.author: JimmieCoffey

customer_reviews.title: The quality was good, but I ordered a natural gas BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This product is manufactured 60 miles from my home in SoCal. Amazon shipped it out of Fresno, to Ontario, trucked it to LA, back to Ontario, then to me. It took one month. The quality was good, but I ordered a natural gas BBQ. It came in propane. I am now waiting one more month for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use it but it has to stop snowing!
customer_reviews.author: Greg D.

customer_reviews.title: I need help. I'm using propane and even with ...
customer_reviews.text: I need help. I'm using propane and even with the grill turned to low it won't get below 600 degrees. What needs to be changed out on the grill? Any help would be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Can't really say for sure but I think we'll love it. We haven't got the built in barbecue ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't really say for sure but I think we'll love it. We haven't got the built in barbecue done yet!
customer_reviews.author: boscoe

customer_reviews.title: Bow was in pieces. First grill was severely damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: Bow was in pieces. First grill was severely damaged. Second grill wasn't damaged by the box was so torn up. FedEx couldn't even lift it so my husband had to help! UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Emma J.
